headline.main: BUSINESS PEOPLE; Borman in Pursuit Of Fame and an Airline

results.snippet: When Pan American makes a bid for National Airlines, it is one company going after another. When Eastern Air Lines makes a bid, it is Frank Borman at the controls. Everyone knows Frank Borman: astronaut and authentic hero, the tough decent guy who...
results.lead_paragraph: When Pan American makes a bid for National Airlines, it is one company going after another. When Eastern Air Lines makes a bid, it is Frank Borman at the controls. Everyone knows Frank Borman: astronaut and authentic hero, the tough decent guy who moved into the top job at Eastern Air Lines.
